page.title: 12The Seward Family's Sunday.
page.content: Mom usually has a lie in if it was late when she came in the night before but we all get up more or less together and have breakfast. Mom gets ready to go to work, Dad does the washing up and sometimes I help. Dad has a relaxing day mostly, unless the lawns need doing. I go up to my friends at Etching Hill to help with the ducks and hens. Jill (That's my friend) does me some lunch. Dad does himself something to eat and Mom has her dinner at work. Sunday we don't have a traditional lunch, like a roast, as we are not all together long enough, the only time we are together is Sunday evening when Mom comes home and I have returned from my friends,then we all have a shower or bath. Mom gets some supper then we all sit round the fire and chat or watch T.V. In the summer evenings we sit outside and have a barbecue
